response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we estimate its true worth to be around $12,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $11,500. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and support package, ensuring a smooth integration into your existing systems. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to collaborate with you.", "product_price": 11500}
